name: The Labyrinth at Oxkintok: Satunsat
description:
A puzzle-based exploration game that explores the real life archeological site in the Yucatán Peninsula, players navigate through a digital copy of the labyrinth, while also learning about Mayan culture and history. 

Credits

Artist: Michael Billingsley

Programmers: Kenta Yamamoto, Juan Groening

Designer: Logan Wayman

Project Manager: Ryan Sfiligoi

Special thanks to: Dominique Rissolo and the Cultural heritage Engineering Initiative at UC San Diego, National Geographic, Mexico’s National Institute of Anthropology and History, and guidance from David Manuel at Ubisoft
